data.title: Use Your Illusion 2
data.meta_description: Slash Paradise - This is a page about Use Your Illusion 2, Guns N' Roses's fourth studio album: line-up, musicians, tracklist, videos, singles and more.
data.text:
Use Your Illusion Deluxe (2022)

The Use Your Illusion Deluxe box includes 7 CDs featuring both Use Your Illusion albums remastered and two live shows recorded during Get In The Ring Tour 1991-1992. The Ep version of each album includes a bonus CD featuring live songs alson recorded from Get In The Ring Tour.

CD 1 â Use Your Illusion 1: Remastered

CD 2 â Use Your Illusion 1: Remastered CD 3 - Live in Las Vegas (T&M Center 25/01/1992)
